name: Deep Troll
movement: walking speed of 30 feet and burrowing speed of 20 feet
description: The Deep Troll is a large, hulking giant known for its oozing flesh and regenerative capabilities. It has distinctive features such as a grotesque appearance with impressive strength, capable of overwhelming foes in combat.
memorable: The Deep Troll can spawn oozing duplicates of itself, increasing the threat level during encounters.
goals: To overwhelm and defeat adventurers through sheer strength and the creation of oozing allies.
relations: Related to other trolls and oozes, it may be encountered in areas where these creatures coexist.
environment: Typically found in underground or cavernous environments.
strengths: Remarkable regenerative ability allowing it to recover health rapidly and the capacity to create independent allies from its own flesh.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, which temporarily disables its regeneration ability.
attacks: Utilizes Multiattack to deliver a powerful bite and claw strikes, dealing significant piercing and slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Oozing Body, which allows it to create independent oozing allies when it takes substantial damage in combat.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet, enhancing its ability to detect foes in dark environments.
additional_information: Can squeeze through small openings with Malleable Internal Structure.
Very low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.
Relies heavily on physical combat rather than cunning or social interactions.
The oozing duplicates it creates can persist for up to one week.
Extremely durable due to its high hit points and regenerative abilities.
